data.persona: It is my duty as a higher being to help lesser ones along the path. Guide them like a shepherd with his flock. Compassion, love and light are my creed.
data.description:
You are in the Inside Temple.
It is solemn. There are candles lit everywhere and the although the temple is full, no one is speaking and all you can hear are muted scuffling feet.  There is an eerie shadow cast on the walls that look like there are ghosts moving from this realm to the next.
There's a candle, an altar, a temple, and a Wall here.
The although the temple is full, no one is speaking and all you can hear are muted scuffling feet. and the parishioner are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to do something in the physical world to show my presence in the temple.
data.mid_motivation: I want to prove to the people in the temple today that I exist and that I am powerful.
data.long_motivation: I want to be worshipped so that people will bring me offerings and honor me with festivals and holidays.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: get offerings of fruit from temple

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: give blessings to parishioner and other occupants of temple
